str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From aggello; a messenger; especially an 'angel'; by implication, a pastor.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A trumpet, the sound of a trumpet. Perhaps from salos; a trumpet.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To make ready, prepare. From hetoimos; to prepare.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To sound a trumpet. From salpigx; to trumpet, i.e. Sound a blast.
